description:
Yuga and the gang try to help Subaru recover his memory. Light and Commissioner Tasuku disagree over who’ll use the Anti-Lost Weapon against Destroyer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ga Tsukau? Anti Lost Weapon!
Who Will Use It? The Anti-Lost Weapon!
誰が使う? 対ロスト兵器[アンチロスト・ウエポン]!
